name: setVoxelsFor(_:divisions:interiorShells:exteriorShells:patchRadius:)
desc: Sets voxel values in the array to model the volume of the specified mesh and creates the specified number of voxel shells.
declaration:
func setVoxelsFor(_ mesh: MDLMesh, 
        divisions: Int32, 
   interiorShells: Int32, 
   exteriorShells: Int32, 
      patchRadius: Float)
